summary: In the near future, 10 men are voted as the 10 who could lead the world; on the list is leading Hong Kong scientist Dr. Ken.
cast: Andy Lau|Michelle Reis|Anthony Chau-Sang Wong|Claudia Lau|Vincent Kok|Michael Lieu|Angel Wong|Kong Kam|Yiu-Cheung Lai|Jacky Wong|Steven Lau|Wai Yin Tse|Mo-Chan Chik|Mike Lambert|Caponio Nunzino|Jack Lam|Kim Penn|Hugo Kwan|Takeshi Kokoru|Ricardo Alexander|Nunzio Caponio|Piggy Chan|Jing Chow|Mike Leeder|Michael Miller|Wai-Keung Tung|John Whitney|Quinton Wong|Kwong-Kim Yip
title: Tin dei hung sam
